reviewText: A great completion to the episode collection of "Are You Afraid of The Dark?". Contains at least some very awesome episodes, particularly The Tale of The Silver Sight, The Last Dance, and The Many Faces. The only downfall to this product is that in The Night Nurse, the people's voices go out of sync during the last half of the episode. Other than that, this DVD is great and is a must have for any fan of the show!

The video quality was slightly less than the U.S. version of Seasons 1-5.  But, overall I still give it 5 stars due to how rare it is to find Season 6 and 7.  It's a great set to finish your 'Are You Afraid of the Dark' series.
I have seasons 1,2,3,4,5 &7 but can't find 6 anywhere. All the sites that say they carried it are sold out. But I have them all downloaded on my computer.
Always a Great story by the Midnight Society! Highway 13 story is a must see!

great set a little much in price but, they are first press sliver disc hats off to the seller at had 40 of them they must of worked for nick.. studios in orlando FL. wish they would up with season 6 . the seller know who he is just do not want to use his name...

Are You Afraid of the Dark? was a classic show that ran during the 90s on Nickelodeon. This is the perfect opportunity to get your hands on this great show. I suggest that you buy each season individually because its a better deal.
I was thrilled to find the classic Nickelodeon snick series on DVD. Now I can relive some of my childhood memories and share with my nephew.

What CAN I say? This season --- the last one --- costs $39 NEW, or $100, u-s-e-d...
I think I'll buy the one without the scratches and fingerprints.

HIGHLY recommended!

The box was in good condition. However, all 3 DVD's were scratched. I paid to have them cleaned, which helped.
